metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6412 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The transform_save function in transform.c in Augeas 1.0.0 through 1.1.0does not properly calculate the permission values when the umask contains a"7," which causes world-writable permissions to be used for new files andallows local users to modify the files via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6412` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

augeas-lenses - 1.3.0-0ubuntu1
augeas-tools - 1.3.0-0ubuntu1
libaugeas0 - 1.3.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: augeas package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-0ubuntu1').
